Welcome to Computational Materials Science Resources
=====================================================================

This document is intended to summarize resources that help(ed) me to get started 
with computational materials science. 

It will probably be quite messy in the beginning, but the primary intend is to 
help me keeping track.

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
